00012 #include <stdlib.h>
00013 #include <pob-eye.h>

00015 //Function to initialize the POB-PROTO board
00016 void InitPobProto (void)
00017 {
00018         // struct to set the pob-proto
00019         PobProto        Proto; 
00020 
00021         //to get the position of the analogic joystick, you have to set the PORTA as analogic input
00022         Proto.porta=ALL_PORTA_AS_ANA;   
00023 
00024         //all pin of PORTC are configured to manage servomotors
00025         Proto.portc=RC7_AS_SERVO        | RC6_AS_SERVO |RC3_AS_SERVO |RC2_AS_SERVO|RC1_AS_SERVO |RC0_AS_SERVO;  
00026 
00027         //RD0 RD1 RD2 RD3 are configured as digitals output to gear DC motor, RD4 RD5 RD6 RD7 are configured as digitals input
00028         Proto.portd=RD7_AS_DI   | RD6_AS_DI     |RD5_AS_DI |RD4_AS_DI|RD3_AS_DO |RD2_AS_DO      |RD1_AS_DO      |RD0_AS_DO;             
00029         
00030         //set the pob proto
00031         SetPobProto(&Proto);    
00032 }
00033 
00034 int main(void)
00035 {
00036         //init POB-EYE
00037         InitPOBEYE();
00038 
00039         //init UART
00040         InitUART((UInt16)(BR_115200|NO_PARITY|ONE_STOP_BIT|LENGTH_8_BIT));
00041 
00042         //pob-proto init
00043         InitPobProto ();
00044 
00045         return 0;
00046 }
